ap2025_bark_champkill2_content: Your skill in battle is legendary—well fought, champion!
ap2025_bark_champkill3_content: Wreow! ("Paw-sitively wonderful—another fool has bit the dust!")
ap2025_bark_death1: Meeooow! ("By my magi-cat powers, you will return soon!")
ap2025_bark_death2: Miao~ ("Don't worry—you'll be feline fine in no time!")
ap2025_bark_death3: Do not give up, intrepid partier! I believe in you!
ap2025_bark_disco1: Miao~ (Dancing already? Looks like chaos is in the air!)
ap2025_bark_disco2: Meoww! ("A merry jig! Just enough mischief to spice things up!")
ap2025_bark_disco3: Party people, join in on the delight of the disco ball!
ap2025_bark_injungle: Hiss, yowl! ("Entering my territory, looking for my zoomy zones!?")
ap2025_bark_injungle2: This jungle stirs with party potential! What should we do to awaken it...?
ap2025_bark_monsterkill1: Meeooow! (That dragon just got turned into a puff of confetti!)
ap2025_bark_monsterkill2: MEOW! ("You took a party drake? That was my snack for later!")
ap2025_bark_monsterkill3: Drake secured. I commend your heroism!
ap2025_bark_partyfavor1: Purr~ (A party favor for you! Gold and surprises to keep the party rolling!)
ap2025_bark_partyfavor2: Enjoy the gift of gold and goodies!
ap2025_bark_partyfavor3: Mreow~! ("Do you like the treat I left you?")
ap2025_garenattackgaren_enemy: Weh! Ha-hah! I am the true Pengu Garen!
ap2025_garenattackgaren_self: Halt, imposter! You dare parade as me!?
ap2025_garenskin_ally: Thank you for bringing me into your ranks, partiers. We will triumph!
ap2025_garenskin_bothparty: Two of me!? Which is the real soldier of honor? Battle will reveal the truth!
ap2025_garenskin_enemy: Fiends of April Fools' Day! You stand against me, Pengu Garen, bringer of justice!
ap2025_load1_garen: Onward, brave partiers! I, Pengu Garen, shall lead you through this land of chaos.
ap2025_load2_garen: This is a catty, crafty avatar of evil! What shenanigans does he have in store!?
ap2025_load2_shaco: Meow! Hiss! ("Welcome to my Rift of Mayhem!")
ap2025_load3_garen: What's this? Zoomy zones, party drakes, and mouthy minions!?
ap2025_load3_shaco: Mrooow! ("And those are just a few of my surprises!")
ap2025_shacoattackgaren: Hiss~! ("You're getting scratched up, puny Pengu!")
ap2025_shacoattackshaco_enemy: Yowl! ("This is my paw-ty, you sham Shaco!")
ap2025_shacoskin_ally: Purr~ ("I will sow chaos alongside you, partner partiers...")
ap2025_shacoskin_enemy: Hiss...! ("Face me, fight me, you silly fools!")
ap_shacoskin_bothparty: Prrrpp...? ("Am I seeing double of me? That's a lot of Sha-cats!")
aprilfools2025_bark_text_pengugarenhello: Hewwo I am Penguwu Garen uwu
aprilfools2025_bark_text_shacohello: You look like an April Fool!
